name: Cheeky PieZ
description:
Wanna try something new? Something really good, crunchy and fresh? Don’t rush! Others want, too. And they are actually helping themselves to it. Aha! They are munching on our sweets! They must be stopped, and those who disobey…

We’ll show them to the door!

Play Cheeky Piez and show them the real master of this new and shiny world of molasses and caramel, biscuits and cakes, buns and donuts! Becky’s incredible adventures await you!

Try to tame 5 wonder-pets! Each of them has unique abilities that will help you make it through all levels of this incredible game! These meaners won’t stand a chance! No one can come and just take a piece of our delicious pies without our permission!

Hooray! Into the game! Here’s what you’ll find there:

° Over 100 cool levels

° Lots of bosses with unique abilities

° 5 wonder-pets ready to help you at all times!

° Delicious graphics and sounds

° Help and cooperation: help your friends complete levels!
